name: Cuest
description:
You've just woken up when you realized you've been kidnapped and made into a test subject! Pick between three different classes each with their own different abilities and strengths. Can you fight through all 10 stages and escape this place?

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to dash

Left mouse button to attack

Right mouse button to block(if have shield)

1 and 2 to cast abilities(when unlocked)

Credits:

Leonardo Dahendra - Programming and 3D Model

Ruben Tobia Chaiyadi - Music and Sound Effects
